text: geudeul-eun chuaghan haeng-wileul jeojileugeona jasin-eul budanghi dalueoss-eul ttaen hananim-eul tteoolligoseon jasin-ui joee daehae yongseoleul guhani, hananim ioee joeleul yongseohaejul jaga nugu-inga? geudeul-eun (geugeos-i joeim-eul) al-ass-eul ttae geudeul-i haessdeon il-eul gyesoghaji anhnola
